sentences.en: A fruity quality is common to all wine made from this grape.
sentences.cn: 用这种葡萄酿制的所有的葡萄酒有共同的醇味.

sentences.en: A full body blend of Cabernet and Merlot. Pure, persistent and fruity.
sentences.cn: 此酒由苏维翁和美露混合酿造, 酒质纯净, 有持久的果香.

sentences.en: A sweet, fruity full - bodied fortified wine served as an after dinner drink.
sentences.cn: 甜美醇厚, 充满果香的强化葡萄酒,可作餐后酒享用.

sentences.en: Floral and fruity notes, just enough spicy after maturing in vats.
sentences.cn: 带有浓郁的花香和水果香的味道, 在大桶中发酵后口感略带辛辣.

sentences.en: Jerrold laughed again, a solid, fruity laugh.
sentences.cn: 杰罗尔德又笑了，声音浑厚而圆润。

sentences.en: Light straw yellow colour , notes of fruits. Fresh and Fruity.
sentences.cn: 浅草黄色,有草莓等水果香气, 口感清新.

sentences.en: Lin You Shumao here, drift fruity, fresh air, flowers everywhere, beautiful fragrance.
sentences.cn: 这里林幽树茂, 果香飘溢, 空气清新, 野花遍地, 艳丽芳香.

sentences.en: Nose and elegant nose with attractive fruity, floral and citrus fruit aromas.
sentences.cn: 芳香:优雅、馥郁 、 迷人的柑橘属水果的果香及花的清香.

sentences.en: Pure juice crystallization or organic fruity solvent can be also added in.
sentences.cn: 还可以选择性添加纯果汁结晶或有机果味剂.

sentences.en: Style: Dry white medium - bodied, creamy vanilla oak and fruity taste.
sentences.cn: 风格: 干白,中度酒体, 香草橡木奶油气味.

sentences.en: That drink has a fruity taste.
The flavor is mild and fruity, and berry texture is firm.
sentences.cn: 味道温和,水果, 浆果和质地是坚定的.

sentences.en: The wine from this region is rich and fruity.
sentences.cn: 这个地区产的葡萄酒浓郁醇香。

sentences.en: This red wine is soft and fruity.
sentences.cn: 这种红葡萄酒不含酒精而且果味浓.

sentences.en: This shampoo smells fruity and leaves the hair beautifully silky.
sentences.cn: 这款洗发水是果香型的，洗后头发如丝般顺滑。

words.tran_cn: 富有成效的；多产的；果实结得多的
不成功的，徒劳的；不结果实的
果实；结果实；[食品] 水果；成果
圆润的；有果味的；果实状的

trans.tran_cn: 有果味的，果实状的，圆润的
trans.tran_en: tasting or smelling strongly of fruit
